Class AuthorizationSessionBean

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.authorization.AuthorizationSessionBean
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthorizationSession, AuthorizationSessionLocal, AuthorizationSessionRemote
    public class AuthorizationSessionBean
extends Object
implements AuthorizationSessionLocal, AuthorizationSessionRemote
    Business logic for the EJBCA 6.8.0+ authorization system.

      • isAuthorized

        public boolean isAuthorized​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                            String... resources)
        Description copied from interface: AuthorizationSession
        Checks if the current user is authorized for the given resource. Will create audit log.
        Specified by:
        isAuthorized in interface AuthorizationSession
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - The AuthenticationToken to check access for.
        resources - String identifier(s) of the resource(s) in question.
        Returns:
        true if user is authorized, false if not.

        public boolean isAuthorizedNoLogging​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                     String... resources)
        Description copied from interface: AuthorizationSession

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        true if user is authorized, false if not.

      • forceCacheExpire

        public void forceCacheExpire()
        Description copied from interface: AuthorizationSession
        Helper method to clear the local access control rule cache. Normally the cache expires after configured time, but when modifying access rules on the local node we can force cache clearing so we don't have to wait. Other nodes in a cluster will still wait until expire though.
        Specified by:
        forceCacheExpire in interface AuthorizationSession

      • refreshAuthorizationCache

        public void refreshAuthorizationCache()
        Description copied from interface: AuthorizationSessionLocal
        Invoked when authorization cache should be checked for updates.
        Specified by:
        refreshAuthorizationCache in interface AuthorizationSessionLocal

      • getAccessAvailableToAuthenticationToken

        public HashMap<String,​Boolean> getAccessAvailableToAuthenticationToken​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken)
                                                                      throws AuthenticationFailedException
        Specified by:
        getAccessAvailableToAuthenticationToken in interface AuthorizationSessionLocal
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - token
        Returns:
        the access rules available to the AuthenticationToken and its nested tokens, taking each such tokens role membership into account
        Throws:
        AuthenticationFailedException - access denied
